arts.ttl: Wolves and Brighton in £4.2m transfer battle for one of Africa's hottest young stars
arts.sum: Young Gambian striker Abdoulie Manneh has emerged as one of the hottest young African prospects in European football after starring for Mjallby in Sweden

arts.ttl: Brighton keep European dream alive with win at Wolves
arts.sum: Danny Welbeck’s first-half penalty and Brajan Gruda’s late strike did the job.

arts.ttl: Southampton v Manchester City, Fulham v Everton, and more: football – live
arts.sum: Follow goal and news updates from around the grounds Live scores | Tables | And you can drop Barry an email League One playoff: Stockport County have gone ahead at Brisbane Road, with Norwood turning provider to tee up Fraser Horsfall for a back post header from close range that gives the visitors the advantage. League One playoff: Leyton Orient took the lead against Stockport County in their semi-final first leg courtesy of Charlie Kelman’s first-half strike, but the visitors have just equalised after Oliver Norwood scored from the spot. There’s about 30 minutes to play at Brisbane Road. Wycombe Wanderers and Charlton Athletic will contest the first leg of their semi-final at Adams Park tomorrow. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Wolves vs. Brighton: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Wolves host Brighton in the Premier League on Saturday. Preview includes team news, how to watch on TV, score prediction and more.

arts.ttl: Brighton injury news: Fabian Hurzeler issues Kaoru Mitoma, Solly March, Georginio Rutter, James Milner update before Wolves clash
arts.sum: Brighton head coach Fabian Hurzeler provides "negative and positive feedback" on the fitness of his squad ahead of Saturday's Premier League clash with Wolves.

arts.ttl: Premier League: Predictions for all 10 weekend games
